Comment 8: 
As far as I said in few days ago, "exit 1" is not "HOW TO QUIT BATCH FILE WITH CODE 1".
This is "HOW TO QUIT CMD.EXE WITH CODE 1".
Then, If you call the batch file in your command prompt, cmd.exe will be destroyed.
For example, if hg.bat include "exit 1":

-------------------
C:\go>vim go/src/pkg/syscall/syscall_windwos.go

C:\go>echo "ok, i'll edit next file. before editing, I'll update repo."
ok, i'll edit next file. before editing, I'll update repo.

C:\go>hg pull
-------------------

You will lost your command prompt.

This is not problem "how batch file should be changed".
